/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -std=c++11 -O3 -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/audioCaptureInterface.dir/remoteMic.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/audioCaptureInterface -rdynamic ../../lib/libaudioLib.a /usr/local/lib/libYARP_dev.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_name.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_init.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_math.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_sig.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_OS.so.2.3.68 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
